<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Fetch Evaluation Status"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/evaluations/{evaluation_id}/status"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Fetches the status of the evaluation.

Args:
    evaluation_id (str): the evaluation id
    request (Request): the request object

Returns:
    (str): the evaluation status

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"evaluation_id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","title":"Evaluation Id"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
